Package melting.exceptions

Exception Summary
FileException This class represents an exception raised by a parameters file or another Melting file.
MethodNotApplicableException This class represents an exception for a method or model which is not applicable.
NoExistingMethodException This class represents an exception for a method or model which doesn't exist.
NoExistingOutputFileException This class represents an exception for an output file which doesn't exist.
NucleicAcidNotKnownException This class represents an exception for a nucleic acid which is not known by Melting.
OptionSyntaxError This class represents an exception raised by an option syntax error.
SequenceException This class represents a problem within the sequences.
ThermodynamicParameterError This class represents a problem with the thermodynamic parameters.
